2a3da254cb49167bf82b3a66068abe61 (15:30): So I'm being bugspammed by bug 517482 much more than in the past. Is anyone aware of changes to the test boxen, or people logging into the machines and such as of the 10th/11th of January?
2a3da254cb49167bf82b3a66068abe61 (15:30): If not, maybe something broke wrt that code and the orange isn't quite so completely random anymore. :\
81fa1e07c4ea96f215901d989f8bf37b (15:30): wonders if he should just add a Reset function to nsIFind
2a3da254cb49167bf82b3a66068abe61 (15:31): (to quantify 'much more' - the bug is from september 2009, and about 60 of the 140 auto-filed comments are from the past week)
2a3da254cb49167bf82b3a66068abe61 (15:31): Obviously I can just un-CC myself, but I figured that maybe there's a real problem. :)
